text: James Boswell (29 October 1740 (N.S.) â€“ 19 May 1795) was a Scottish lawyer and author. He is best known for having written the Life of Johnson, a biography of his close friend Samuel Johnson, published in 1791. In the 1920s and 1930s, a large number of his personal papers and journals were discovered. They have since then been published by Yale University. == Other websites == * James Boswell - a guide Category:1740 births Category:1795 deaths Category:Writers from Edinburgh
title: James Boswell
